name: whois-lookup-scraper
description: An Apify actor that retrieves Whois information for a list of domains using Python. Useful for domain research, monitoring, and bulk Whois lookups. Handles errors gracefully and outputs results to the Apify dataset.
title: Bulk Whois Lookup Scraper
author: Salman Bareesh <your-email@example.com>

changelog.description: Enhanced metadata, added example input, improved documentation.
